Class SmoothMover

java.lang.Object
  Actor
      SmoothMover

public abstract class SmoothMover
extends Actor

A variation of an actor that maintains precise location (using doubles for the co-ordinates instead of ints). It also maintains a current movement vector that is independent of the current rotation of the actor.

Constructor Summary
SmoothMover()
          Create a SmoothMover with an empty movement vector (standing still).
SmoothMover(double movementX, double movementY)
          Create new SmoothMover initialised with given velocity.
